statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = true;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = false ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND is_fraudulent = true
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 2
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_address='New York';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='sale' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND customer_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reported_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, is_fraudulent FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY account_balance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraudulent = true AND amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_holder_name, SUM(account_balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY account_holder_name HAVING total_balance > 10000 ORDER BY total_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, is_suspicious FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name, rule_description FROM fraud_patterns WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name, account_balance FROM accounts WHERE account_balance > 10000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_datetime DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name FROM fraud_patterns WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type, account_balance FROM Accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT fraud_detection_score, fraud_detection_reason FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE fraud_detection_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE account_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 500 ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT account_id, account_type, account_balance FROM Accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, fraud_detection_score, fraud_detection_reason FROM FraudulentTransactions WHERE fraud_detection_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY fraud_detection_score DESC;
